snippet: Susan E. Rice’s support for African despots over the years would make her a troubling selection for secretary of state.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Salem Solomon argues Ambassador Susan E Rice's past support for African despots would make her a troubling selection for secretary of state; criticizes her decision to support sanctions against Eritrea in 2009.
lead_paragraph: Susan E. Rice’s support for African despots over the years would make her a troubling selection for secretary of state.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
